name: Paper Plane
description:
"Paper Plane" is a difficulty 2D shooting game with hilarious atmosphere;

A combination of “Shoot Them Up” and “Parkour” gameplay style;
You need to get enough fuel by shooting as many as enemies to reach the goal;
With more than 50 challenging stage areas and 5 BOSS Fights;

Most animations and characters were drawn by Office Excel and sound FX recorded by voice acting, mixed by morden electronic music；

What a bizarred and novel experience;
